This code was provided in the assignment description.

```{r}

library(lattice) # Load the lattice package
library(xtable) # generate the LaTeX code for tables

set.seed(123) # Fix the random generator seed

data <- rnorm(1000) # Create data

histogram(data) # Plot histogram
densityplot(data^12 / data^10, xlab = expression(data^12/data^10)) # Plot density 
stripplot(data^2, xlab = expression(data^2)) # Plot stripplot
bwplot(exp(data)) # Plot boxplot

data.all <- cbind(data = data, # Matrix with all data used
                  squared1 = data^12 / data^10,
                  squared2 = data^2,
                  exponent = exp(data))

?xtable
xtable(data.all)

```
